main event: Two bright objects emitting white light were sighted on two different occasions near Yazd and Damghan, Iran.
interesting points: The first sighting lasted for 10 minutes and 15 seconds, while the second sighting lasted for 10 minutes and 45 seconds., The objects were brighter than stars and emitted a white light., The objects were observed 25 miles south of Highway 60 at about 40 degrees up in the sky., During the second sighting, the light intensity was less than the first time., A white trail was visible for forty-five seconds after the objects returned to the horizon.
sighted object: two bright objects in the sky
